name: Spidded
description:
A hungry spider, dodging a fly swatter, tries to confuse flies in a web and devour them, but difficult levels and an unstable web confuse all his plans.

Spidded - An arcade platformer in which the player acts as a spider that moves with its web, dodging a fly swatter and balancing on an unstable web.

Features of the game:
- Agility Training
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Complexity
